PolicyPage.Name: Aging Report for Pathway Students
PolicyPage.Title: Aging Report for Pathway Students
PolicyPage.BodyCopy:
Report is from: Bursar's Office

Report is to: Online Learning (Online Degrees and Services)
Purpose: To inform Online Learning of Pathway students who have not paid their tuition and fees.
Date: 3/29/2012
This report will be created and maintained by the Bursar's Office.

The report will separate domestic and international Pathway students based on their billing type code. 

The report will show which students owe the University money and how delinquent the students are in paying tuition and fees.

Once this report has been created, it will be sent to the Online Student Support Coordinator (OSSC). The OSSC (or those assigned by the OSSC) will contact the students on the report and/or will notify the Pathway missionaries.  Pathway employees may request a copy of the report as needed.

This report will be created and distributed once a month.  Individual students and student issues concerning payment of tuition and fees can be checked on an individual basis. However, the report will only be created once per month.
